channel.title: brewer on Novice Husband... among other things
channel.description: Recent content in brewer on Novice Husband... among other things

item.title: Fivestar PBW
item.description: PBW is made by Five Star Chemicals. It can be re-used for only a 12 hour period… So the manufacturer says. :) I have found that I can re-use the solution many times.

item.title: Force Carbonation
item.description: Once kegged your beer needs to be carbonated. I am struggling to get the levels right, but for now these are the steps that I take.

item.title: Gelatin Mix for Beer Clarity
item.description: Description This is to assist with clarification of a 18 to 23 liter batch of beer by adding gelitin to the fermented beer. The beer is not carbonated at this stage.
